text: The discography of John Williamson, an Australian singer-songwriter, consists of twenty studio albums, twenty-four compilation album, eight live album, three EPs. Williamson has sold over 4 million records in Australia. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |+ ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:20em;" | Title !
